definition: jointing machine/riveter/welder/sealer/to meet a plane (i.e. to meet sb at airport)/to service a plane (of airport workers)
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: Do you have a transfer service from airport to hotel free of charge?
sentences.chinese: 请问贵酒店有没有免费接机服务？

sentences.english: Kunming airport pick the contract after the signing of travel, freedom of movement.
sentences.chinese: 昆明机场接机后签订旅游合同，自由活动。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a new type of control circuit of SAW.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新型的埋弧自动焊接机的控制电路。

sentences.english: This article introduced the using of USB model block where it was used in automated welding machine and the design.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了USB模块在自动焊接机中的应用及其设计。

sentences.english: B is responsible for staging the pick to go abroad and accommodation arrangements and costs.
sentences.chinese: 负责乙方出国集结地的接机和食宿安排和费用。

sentences.english: Also introduced each part's construction and function of this welding machine system.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了该焊接机系统各分部的结构和功能。

sentences.english: It is an accessory connecting the cutting torch and the flame cutting machine.
sentences.chinese: 机用朝炬夹持静是建接机用割炬与火焰切村机的附件。

sentences.english: OK, we'll arrange the car for you.
sentences.chinese: 好的，我们会安排接机和送机。

sentences.english: Yes. Mr. Zhang is going with a name plate of Mike.
sentences.chinese: 安排了，张先生会带着迈克的接机牌去接他。

sentences.english: The TIG welder used for much of the construction.
sentences.chinese: 在氩弧焊焊接机建造多次使用。

sentences.english: The control parts of the digital ultrasonic welding machine are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种数控的超声波焊接机的控制方法。

sentences.english: A network control system for welding machine based on Ethernet is described.
sentences.chinese: 焊接机基于以太网的网络控制系统。

sentences.english: The all-hydraulic riveting machine is important mechanical equipment used in automobile industry now.
sentences.chinese: 全液压铆接机是目前汽车装配生产中使用的重要设备。

sentences.english: The thirteenth day Venice flying to Paris, guide pick up.
sentences.chinese: 第十三天威尼斯飞往巴黎，导游接机。

sentences.english: I was meeting someone. We are not protected in this country," another witness, Alexei, told the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我是去那里接机的，国家没有保护好我们。

sentences.english: It can be used as a hot air welder for light weight fabric welding applications.
sentences.chinese: 在当作热空气焊接机使用时，可用于轻型纤维的焊接。

definition: to get off a plane/to deplane
to check on sb at his workplace/to come to a movie set to visit one of the actors
Beijing Airport (PEK)/also translated as Capital Airport
to see someone off/to throw someone a send-off party
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
